field.label: Braintree Merchant Id
field.tooltip: Please enter the Braintree Merchant Id you want to use to process the transactions. You will find your Merchant Id in your Braintree Control Panel under Settings > API > Keys > Client-Side Encryption Keys > Merchant ID.
field.comment:
In order for Braintree to accept payments via Google Pay in sandbox or production, you will need to enable it in the Braintree Control Panel.
Please check Braintree's documentation for more information on Google Pay Setup.

field.label: Client key
field.tooltip: Please enter the Client key which you will find in your Braintree Control Panel under Settings > API > Keys > Tokenization Keys.

field.label: Public Key
field.tooltip: Please enter the Public key which you will find in your Braintree Control Panel under Settings > API > Keys > API Keys > Public Key.

field.label: Private Key
field.tooltip: Please enter the Private key which you will find in your Braintree Control Panel under Settings > API > Keys > API Keys > Private Key.
field.comment: Please check Braintree's documentation for more information on Braintree's Gateway Credentials.
